nodes.text: Merish Hath was a Human female and a citizen of Athar on the planet of JanFathal.

In 22 BBY, she and her boyfriend Shil Kaval met with an undercover Republic agent Hallena Devis and later participated, along with the local rebels, in an uprising against the Republic-aligned Regent of the planet. When Devis's position as a spy was revealed, Hath, along with Varti and Kaval took her hostage. When the Republic strike team arrived to rescue Devis, she was killed by Jedi Master Djinn Altis.
